name: Holiday Games
overview: Summer, sun, vacation time, a relaxing time - or not quite? Because the stress starts with the transport of the suitcases and the vulture still knows everything for stuff in the trunk. Everything wants to be included, but there is never enough space. Once there, instead of lying lazily in the sun on the beach, you have to take part in all possible and impossible events and competitions. Then there would be "mussel diving", "cherry stone spitting", "swimming competition", "fishing" and "disco dancing". Published in Game On 1993/09.
